text: Neighbourhood shopping malalot if earties around. U may have budget food at ntwu canteen beside the interchange also some others along the bus waiting area.
Amazing mall with lots of food options, including a food court, a variety of shops, and accessories to the LRT, MRT, and buses.

Hillion Mall: Where Convenience Meets Lifestyle!

Located right at the heart of Bukit Panjang, Hillion Mall is more than just a shopping center—it's a vibrant lifestyle hub where everything you need is right at your doorstep. With seamless integration to the MRT, LRT, and bus interchange, the mall offers unbeatable convenience for commuters and shoppers alike.

Step inside and you'll find a lively mix of retail stores, beauty services, dining options, and a spacious supermarket. Whether you're grabbing a quick coffee at Starbucks, indulging in a hearty meal at Food Junction, or ticking off your grocery list at NTUC FairPrice, Hillion Mall has it all under one roof.

What makes it special?
It’s a cozy neighborhood mall with a modern twist. The open-air plaza often hosts pop-up events, festive markets, and performances, adding an energetic buzz to your visit. Plus, the mall’s proximity to Hillion Residences and community spaces makes it feel like the beating heart of Bukit Panjang.

Final verdict?
Hillion Mall is perfect for those who love effortless shopping, diverse dining, and easy connectivity. Whether you're a local or just passing through, it offers a refreshing break with all the essentials—and a little extra charm!
Not a big shopping mall. But got a lot of food and eating places. Have most of the basic shops like supermarket, pharmacy, bakery, etc.
Food and shopping is the most past times that singaporeans does. It brings families closer. That's what Hillion mall have to offer. Varieties upon varieties for everybody.
